english.segment1: Mankind scumbag. I'd rather scratch out my eyes. Self-destruction. I'd rather tie my own noose
english.segment2: Humanity. Cough up your lines. I'd rather die
english.segment3: I can't witness. Without being so bitter. Hatred without bias. I've judged you all
english.segment4: Humanity. Cough up your lines. I'd rather die. I'd rather die
english.segment5: Harboring hate. I've got to let it all go. My own fate. I know I know I know
english.segment6: Humanity. Cough up your lines. I'd rather die
english.segment7: I'd rather die. Than live a lie. I'd rather die. Than live your life
